short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate Your Candidate Sourcing on LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

Candidate sourcing is made easy and effective with the Spark.work LinkedIn Extension!  
Our powerful tool is designed to streamline and enhance your recruiting efforts on LinkedIn. It allows you to easily bring top-tier talent to Spark.work HRM platform’s recruitment module.  

KEY FEATURES:

1. Automatically scan LinkedIn opened active profile and extract information such as experience, education, and contact details  
2. With a single “Save” click, bring the candidate information to your sourcing platform and, from there, initiate the hiring journey with candidates by utilizing dedicated pipelines and predefined stages.  
3. Assigning candidates to job openings in Spark.work. 
 
NOTE:

The Spark.work extension is an independent product not affiliated with or endorsed by LinkedIn. To use the Spark.work LinkedIn extension, you must have a Spark.work account with proper recruitment rights.  
Download the Spark.work LinkedIn Extension now and transform the way you discover and connect with talent on LinkedIn!

Elevate Your Candidate Sourcing on LinkedIn!
